config_description: Replica factor is determined via the replication strategy used by the specified keyspace.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration 'allocate_tokens_for_keyspace' is used to determine the token allocation strategy for generating suitable tokens. If initial tokens are specified, they are used, otherwise, if allocationKeyspace is specified, the token allocation algorithm is used to generate tokens. If neither initial tokens nor allocationKeyspace is specified, a random selection of tokens is made.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The triggering frequency of the 'allocate_tokens_for_keyspace' configuration depends on when new nodes are added to the system or when token allocation needs to be recalculated due to changes in the keyspace or replication strategy.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the 'allocate_tokens_for_keyspace' configuration option is significant as it determines the distribution of tokens among nodes in the cluster, affecting data distribution, load balancing, and overall performance of the system.
